Raquel is single and has lived with her parents at their house for the past six years. Her business has been in existence for almost a year. Raquel started out delivering groceries to different places, but over time, she and her family were able to raise money so that she could continue her business by obtaining a store. She has many customers and is well-known in the area. Raquel is happy to have the opportunity to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Victoria Isabel

texts.es:
Victoria es una mujer muy trabajadora, tiene 29 años de edad, está casada y junto a sus esposo tienen 2 hijos cuyas edades comprenden 6 años y 18 meses, su esposo trabaja conduciendo una mototaxi, pero también la apoya mucho en todo lo que ella hace, es su mano derecha, Victoria como buena peruana ama nuestra comida y uno de los platillos que a ella le gusta mucho es el riquísimo “Pollo a la Brasa”, es mas ella no se cansaría de comerlo todos los días; debido a que sus padres no tenían los medios económicos suficientes, solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar Computación e informática.

Victoria se dedica a la venta de abarrotes y artículos de primera necesidad, trabaja alrededor de 15 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 20 clientes en el día,  ella se dedico a este negocio porque antes su mama lo atendía pero la engañaban mucho con los billetes y monedas falsas y por ese motivo su mama se desanimo y lo cerro, con el tiempo ella decidió reabrirlo y por ello ahorro mucho para invertir en él; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy atenta con los clientes, además de ofrecer productos de buena calidad.

Victoria agradece mucho a los prestatarios Kiva ya que con su apoyo ella podrá comprar mercadería para la campaña escolar (útiles escolares, uniformes, entre otros) y poder ofrecerla en su bodega, con esta mejora tendrá mayores ingresos y podrá seguir ampliando su negocio, con lo que podrá seguir ahorrando para poder cumplir su más grande sueño:”Darle una profesión a sus hijos y Tener una Bodega- Bazar”.
texts.en:
Victoria is a very hard-working woman.  She is 29 years old, married, and she and her husband have two children, ages 6 years and 18 months.  Her husband works driving a mototaxi, but also supports her a lot in everything she does.  He is her right hand.  Victoria, as a good Peruvian, loves our food and one of the meals that she enjoys very much is the delicious "Pollo a la Brasa" (Peruvian roasted chicken).  She could eat this everyday without getting tired of it.  Since her parents didn't have sufficient economic means, she could only study until the fifth grade of secondary education, but she would have very much liked to study computation and information.  

Victoria sells general and staple goods.  She works around 15 hours a day and attends to about 20 customers a day.  She works at this business because her mother did before her. However, they deceived her with counterfeit money and for this reason, she became discouraged and closed the business.  In time, she decided to reopen the business and through it, has saved a lot to invest in it.  She thinks that her business is going well because she is attentive to her customers, and moreover, she offers good quality products.

Victoria is very grateful to the Kiva lenders since with their support, she can purchase merchandise for the school year (school supplies, uniforms, among others) and can offer them in her store.  With this improvement, she will have greater income and can continue growing her business, allowing her to continue saving to be able to complete her greatest dream: giving her children a profession and having a store.

loans.use: to purchase merchadise (school supplies)

loans.name: Huda

texts.en:
Huda is a conservative lady, and for that reason, she asked her husband Omar to take her place in the photo.

Huda, 25 years old and a married lady, has three children. Her husband Omar works for the Public Security Department. 

Huda started a small business at first to fill her free time at home. She start a clothes retail business, and within few months of launching the business, Huda loved the idea and decided to work on enhancing it and expanding it, so she has applied for a youth loan in order to buy more clothes to increase her revenue and open her own clothes store.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to increase her revenue and open her own clothes store.

loans.name: Rania

texts.en: Rania is a 24-year-old married lady with a 4-year-old daughter. Her husband works at two jobs: the first one is farming and the second one is as a private car driver. To start saving up for her daughter’s future, Rania began a small home-based business selling blankets to relatives and neighbors. Now she has applied for a youth loan to bring in more products besides blankets, such as home products according to what her customers ask for.

loans.use: to add more products other than blankets, such as home products.

loans.name: Tharwat

texts.en: Tharwat is a 22-year-old single lady. She has two brothers and one sister who are living with their mother after their father passed away. Tharwat is attending one of the Jordanian universities to study and become an athletic trainer or teacher. She has applied for this loan in order to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Sharifa

texts.en: Sharifa is a 26-year-old married lady, who insisted on following up on her education in the university. Sharifa is studying to get her bachelor degree in children care studies. She has applied for a loan to pay for the next semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for the next semester fees.

loans.name: Nader

texts.en:
Nader is a 29-year-old young man, he is married with one son. 

Nader is employed with a low salary, which is not enough to cover all the family's needs and costs. He is requesting a youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the cost of purchasing new bedroom furniture to improve his home living conditions. 

This will enable Nader to give himself and his wife more comfortable and suitable home furniture and live in better conditions. Nader is photographed in the picture.


About this loan product:
FATEN offers loans that are customized for Muslim borrowers. A key principle of Islam is the prohibition of charging interest on a loan. This prohibition is based on the belief that money is only a medium of exchange and has no value in itself. In order to offer loans in a manner that is consistent with borrowers' values, FATEN charges 0% interest on this loan. However, FATEN does charge a servicing fee to cover its costs. The loan amount you see listed on Kiva includes both the principal loan and the loan servicing fees. As with all Kiva loans, you should expect to have your funds returned to you according to this loan’s repayment schedule. For more information on lending in the Muslim world, please click here.

loans.use: To purchase new bedroom furniture

loans.name: Fernanado Rafael

texts.es: Fernando conoce muy bien la actividad de pescar, pues se dedicó a ella durante una temporada; él inicialmente emprendió su negocio vendiendo ostras por las calles de la ciudad, después empezó a familiarizarse en el rio con la pesca y se dedicó a ella, pero las crecientes y dificultades que se presentaron lo hicieron desistir y dedicarse solo a comprar y vender pescado, como bocachico, lebranches, corvina y chivo. Cuando inició su negocio comercial invirtió un pequeño capital  y pocos clientes entre los que estaban sus amigos y personas muy cercanas a su familia. Con su esfuerzo su negocio fue creciendo y hoy tienen mas de 60 compradores independientes y además vende en restaurantes; a sus clientes le toma el pedido, lleva el pescado en la mañana y recupera el dinero en las horas de la tarde; en su vivienda también tiene una clientela muy cerca que le compra y le hace encargos frecuentemente. Sus compras las realiza directamente a los pescadores, con quienes ha establecido relaciones comerciales  efectivas.  Fernando vive muy apasionado por esta actividad, porque con ella ha logrado sostener a su familia, tener su propia casa y disfrutar de sus conocimientos en pescado fresco. Su meta mas adelante es tener una pescadería, donde pueda conservar sus pescados y venderlos en un punto muy reconocido en la orilla del rio; así mismo ver a sus hijos realizados y exitosos en lo que emprendan. En la actualidad está aplicando  a su primer credikiva, también primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el que comprará un congelador, para almacenar un número mayor de pescados y comprará mas cantidad de productos para lograr descuentos con los pescadores, quienes están esperando esta negociación para lograr también sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Fernando knows fishing very well, as he worked in it for one season. In the beginning, he launched his business selling oysters on the streets of the city. Later, he began to familiarize himself with fishing in the river, and worked at that. But the increasing difficulties that arose made him stop this, and just work buying and selling fish such as bocachico, mullet, corvina, and goatfish.

When he started his retail business, he invested a small amount of capital and attracted a few customers among his friends and people very close to his family.  With his effort, his business started to grow, and now he he has more than 60 independent buyers. He also sells to restaurants and takes orders from customers. 

In the morning he takes the fish around, and collects the money in the afternoon hours. He also has customers living nearby, who buy from him at his home and often place orders with him. He purchases directly from the fishermen, with whom he has established an effective business relationship.

Fernando has a passion for this work, because through it he has managed to support his family, own his own house, and to use his knowledge of fresh fish. His goal is to eventually have a fish store, where he can keep his fish, and sell them at a very well-known place by the river.  Likewise he hopes to see his children fulfilled and successful in whatever they undertake. 

At the present time, he is applying for his first credikiva, and also the first loan he is taking out with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will use it to buy a freezer to store a greater number of fish. He will buy product in greater quantity so that he can get discounts from the fishermen, who are also hoping to do business with him, so that they can obtain their income.

loans.use: To buy a freezer for storing a greater number of fish, allowing him to buy product in larger quantities.

loans.name: Zainabu

texts.en: Zainab is a 26-year-old single woman. She has 1 child.  Zainab operates a food and beverage sales business from home. She has been in this business for 3 years. Her primary customers are passers-by and neighbours.  Zainab's other source of income includes selling second-hand clothes.  Her highest monthly expense is food and medical bills.  She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water.   Zainab will use this KES 25,000 loan to purchase bales of clothes to resell.  She aspires to establish a boutique in the future. She joined Yehu to access capital.

loans.use: buy clothes

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is 33 years old, married, and has three children, ages six, four, and two years respectively. He has been selling maize for the past ten years and earns a monthly income of KES 9,000.

He will use the loan amount to buy more bags of maize to boost his business. He has requested a loan of KES 30,000. 

The anticipated profit would help him pay school fees for his children. His dream is to develop his plot in Langas.

loans.use: to purchase more bags of maize to add to the existing stock.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is 68 years old, a father of nine, and is married to Jessica. He practices rabbit-keeping, which he has done for one year, and earns a monthly income of KES 5,000. 

He has requested a loan of KES 10,000 to buy feed for the rabbits and building materials to extend the rabbits’ shelter.

loans.use: to purchase rabbit feed and building materials to extend the rabbits' shed.

loans.name: Thawra

texts.en:
Thawra is a conservative woman, who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Mahmoud appears in her Kiva profile photo.
Thawra is a 24-year-old young woman and is married with two sons. 
Her husband is employed, but gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover all the family's costs. Thawra is requesting a 1,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of repairing her house's old walls. 
This will help improve the family's home living conditions.

loans.use: To make repairs to the house's old walls.

loans.name: Yahiya

texts.en:
Yahiya is a 28-year-old man. He is the father of two sons and one daughter. He is employed, but earns a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's costs. For the past two years, to increase his income, he has worked as a taxi driver, which has been a profitable project.
Yahiya is requesting a 1,500 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of licensing the taxi and making some necessary repairs to it, such as changing tires, painting it, etc. This will increase the taxi's efficiency and enable him to work extra hours and take more internal and external requests to positively improve the family's income. Yahiya is photographed next to his taxi.

loans.use: To pay for repairing and licensing the taxi

loans.name: Nun

texts.en:
Nun is a 65-year-old married woman who resides in Prey Chor district. She has been blessed with 4 children, 3 of whom are living together with her in her home. They always help Nut and her husband do their farming project, especially during the rainy season. Rice is the main product for the family to generate income. 

In order to improve her living, Nun would like to take a loan from HKL and Kiva to purchase a motorcycle to satisfy the family’s needs both for household and business purposes. In the future, Nun plans to expand her farming business and produce as much rice output as possible.

loans.use: purchase a motorcycle

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a married woman. She has one child who is enrolled in school. 

Mariam operates a cashew nuts selling business and sells her goods from home. She has worked in this business for three years. Her primary customers are her neighbors and passersby. 

She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality. Her highest monthly expense is food for her family. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

Mariam will use the KES 40,000 loan to purchase more stocks of cashew nuts for resale. She aspires to establish a retail shop in the future. She joined Yehu to acquire capital to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of cashew nuts for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruits, vegetables and maize for resale.

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar is a married man. He has one child. His wife works as a business lady. 

Omar operates a computer bureau and offers his services in a shop. He has worked in this business for two years. His primary customers are the local area residents. He describes his greatest business challenge to be inadequate capital to expand his business. His highest monthly expense is food for his family. He owns a house that has both electricity and piped water. 

Omar will use the KES 40,000 loan to purchase a computer and stationery for his business. He aspires to establish a wholesale shop in the future. He joined Yehu to acquire capital to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase a computer and stationery for his business.

loans.name: Helena Jemutai

texts.en: For 15 years, Hellena has owned a grocery shop that earns her a monthly income of KES. 10,000. She has requested a loan for KES 70,000 to buy fruits, vegetables, rice, beans and maize for resale. The anticipated profit from her business will help her to buy more stock for her store. Hellena's hopes are to continue with her grocery business and to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more groceries and cereals for resale.

loans.name: Ruba

texts.en:
Ruba is a 25-year-old woman who is married with one son. Her husband (pictured) is a lawyer who works in a private office but receives a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's expenses. 

Ruba's husband, whose name is Talha, decided to improve his income by opening his own office to provide legal consultations for customers. Therefore, Ruba is requesting a $3,000 youth loan from FATEN to help her husband buy the necessary office equipment such as a printer, copier and fax machine as well as the necessary office furniture such as chairs, shelves, a desk, etc. Having his own office will enable Talha to increase his income and improve the family's living conditions.

Ruba is a conservative woman who prefers not to have her photo published online. So her husband, Talha, appears in her Kiva profile photo above.

loans.use: To purchase office equipment and office furniture.

loans.name: Eman

texts.en:
Eman is a 24-year-old young woman. She is married and has no children yet. Her husband is employed, but gets a low salary that is not enough to cover life's costs.
 
Eman is requesting a youth loan from FATEN to help her cover the cost of purchasing necessary home furniture such as living room seats, dining room furniture, etc., in order to improve the house's condition. This will offer to Eman and her husband better and suitable home living conditions.

Eman is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband, Shareef, appears in her Kiva profile photo.

About this loan product:
FATEN offers loans that are customized for Muslim borrowers. A key principle of Islam is the prohibition of charging interest on a loan. This prohibition is based on the belief that money is only a medium of exchange and has no value in itself. In order to offer loans in a manner that is consistent with borrowers' values, FATEN charges 0% interest on this loan. However, FATEN does charge a servicing fee to cover its costs. The loan amount you see listed on Kiva includes both the principal loan and the loan servicing fees. As with all Kiva loans, you should expect to have your funds returned to you according to this loan’s repayment schedule. For more information on lending in the Muslim world, please click here.

loans.use: to purchase new home furniture.

loans.name: Shahera

texts.en:
Shahera is a 30-year-old woman, a mother with two sons and four daughters. Her husband is a Palestinian National Authority employee who gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's costs. 

Shahera is moving to a new house and does not have enough home furniture, so she is requesting a 1,500 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her cover the cost of purchasing the necessary home furnishings she needs such as: bedroom furniture, new living room furniture, etc. This will improve the family's living conditions.

Shahera is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband AlaaAddeen appears in her Kiva profile photo.

loans.use: To purchase new home furniture.

loans.name: Yeny Mili

texts.es:
Yeny vive en la ciudad de chincha ciudad conocida por su población de origen afroperuano, por sus danzas y es la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano, por sus hermosas playas y por la producción de nuestro producto Bandera el “Pisco”, también esta ciudad es muy conocida por su comida ya que los pobladores de esa ciudad se les conoce por la buena sazón que tienen por ello uno de los platos que más le gusta a Luz es la riquísima “Carapulcra con sopa seca”, Yeny es conviviente y su pareja la apoya mucho en todo lo que hace.

Yeny es muy trabajadora, se dedica a la venta de frutas, se levanta desde muy temprano para poder realizar los quehaceres del hogar y velar por su negocio, trabaja alrededor de 8 horas diarios y puede atender hasta 25 clientes al dia, Yeny cree que le va bien en su negocio porque Dios guía sus pasos, permitiéndole trabajar día a día.

Yeny agradece mucho a los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo ella podrá comprar mercadería al por mayor con ello podrá comprar sus productos a menor precio, con esta mejora tendrá mayores ingresos, lo que le permitirá ahorrar para poder cumplir su gran sueño:”Tener un mejor ambiente para vivir y ser una empresaria de éxito”.
texts.en:
Yeny lives in the Chincha city known for its population of African-Peruvian origin, its dances, its beautiful beaches, its production of the new flagship product "Pisco," and it is the cradle of great glories of Peruvian sport. Also this city is well known for its food since the inhabitants of this city are known for their good taste and therefore one of the most liked dishes to date is the rich "Carapulcra con sopa seca." Yeny is living with her partner who supports her very much in all that she does.

Yeny is very hardworking. She sells fruit for a living. She gets up very early in order to perform the household chores and ensure her business. She works around 8 hours daily and can serve up to 25 customers a day. Yeny believes that she is doing well in her business because God guides her steps, allowing her to work every day.

Yeny is very grateful to the Kiva lenders being that thanks to your support she will be able to purchase merchandise wholesale, and with that she will be able to buy her products at lower prices. With this improvement, she will have larger profits, which will allow her to save in order to be able to achieve her great dream: "to have a better environment to live and to be a successful entrepreneur."

loans.use: to purchase of merchandise (wholesale).

loans.name: Philice

texts.en:
Philice is 40 years old, married and has seven children aged 17, 16, 15, 14, 12, 10 and 2 years.  She owns a cafe, a business that she has been running for two years.  The business earns a monthly income of KES 3,000.  

Philice has requested a loan of KES 15,000 to buy wheat flour, cooking fat and sugar.   The profit she earns will enable her buy a sheep.  Her dream is to start up a shop and educate her children.

loans.use: buy flour, cooking fat and sugar

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en: Naomi is taking another Kiva loan of KES 40,000 to boost her existing business. With this loan, she intends to purchase a blow dryer machine, weaves and chemicals for her beauty salon business. The previous loan enabled her to expand and she has employed one person to work in her beauty salon business.  She dreams of establishing another beauty salon business in the future.

loans.use: purchase a hair dryer, weaves and chemicals

loans.name: Cissy

texts.en:
Cissy  lives in Kampala, Uganda.  She is married and has 4 children, 3 of whom are in school.  Cissy has a business selling second-hand clothes.  She has been in this business for 1 year and works 7 days a week.  She sells her products in a shop by means of wholesale and retail.  She also generates additional income through selling piped water.

Cissy has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO to buy more bales of used clothes to sell. The main business challenges for Cissy are transportation and thieves.  Her goals and aspirations for her business are to start selling on wholesale only and to start importing used clothes.   

Cissy lives in a home that she owns.  She has access to electricity and piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include utility bills, school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: buy second-hand clothes

loans.name: Monicah

texts.en:
Monicah is a 55-year-old married woman. She has two children. 

Monicah operates a poultry business and sells her goods from home. She has worked in this business for five years and was previously employed as a teacher. Her primary customers are neighbours and restaurant operators. 

Monicah's other source of income includes support from her children, who are already employed. She describes her greatest business challenge to be disease outbreak. Her highest monthly expenses are food and clothing. She rents a house that has electricity but no piped water. 

Monicah will use the KES 25,000 loan to purchase chicks and chicken feed. She aspires to sell wholesale in the future. She joined Yehu to access capital.

loans.use: to purchase chicks and chicken feed.

loans.name: Eslys

texts.es:
Eslys es una madre de familia de 18 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y a su pequeña hija en el caserío Malingas, una zona rural del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima tropical caracterizado por la producción de frutas como el mango y el limón. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a cinco horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
Se dedica a la comercialización de prendas de vestir, la cual distribuye en los caseríos del sector, para lo cual cuenta con clientela ya establecida en la zona, de otro lado se dedica a la crianza de ganado menor, el cual al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado local. Los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad le sirven para apoyar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.
La creciente demanda por las prendas que ofrece ha hecho que tenga que adquirir más mercadería para poder satisfacer a su creciente clientela. Por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le permitan lograr su objetivo.
Ella es una persona bastante conocida y estimada por sus vecinos y conocidos, quienes la consideran una mujer responsable y hogareña.
texts.en:
Eslys is an 18-year-old parent. She lives with her husband and her small daughter in the settlement of Malingas, This is a rural area in the Tambogrande farming district, an area with a tropical climate, noted for the production of fruit such as mangos and lemons. 

The area is located in the Piura region, five hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region. 

She sells articles of clothing, which she distributes in the area settlements, for which purpose she already has an established clientele in the area. In addition, she raises small livestock, that she sells in the local market when they reach optimal size and weight.

She uses the income from this livelihood to help her husband support the family finances. The increasing demand for the articles she offers has meant that she has to acquire more merchandise to be able to satisfy her growing clientele. 

For this reason, she found herself needing to apply to Edpyme Alternative for the first time, for a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles that will allow her to attain her objective. She is quite a well-known person, respected by her neighbors and acquaintances, who consider her a responsible and home-loving woman.

loans.use: To acquire more merchandise, so that she can satisfy her growing clientele.

loans.name: Adalat

texts.ru:
Adalat yavlyayetsya IDP personom( Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов)) on pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda seychas projivayet v Fuzuli reione posolok Araz Dilagarda vmeste so svoyey semyoy. 
Adalat 28 let. On ne jenat. Adalat uje 2 qoda kak imeyet svoy magazin gde prodayet pisheviye produkti. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit moyushiye sredstva tak kak v nix yest nujda sredi pokupateley i tem samim on smojet razvit svoy bizness. Etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyego dedushki kotoriy toje imel svoy magazin. Adalat ochen lubit rabotat i delat novshestva v svoyey rabote.
texts.en:
Adelat is an internally displaced person. An internally displaced person (IDP) is someone who has been forced to flee his or her home due to armed conflict, violence, human rights violations, or natural or manmade disasters, but who, unlike a refugee, has not crossed an international border (source: UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs).

Adelat is an immigrant from the city of Fuzuli, and currently he lives in the Fuzuli region, in the village of Araz Dilagarda together with his family. Adelat is 28 years old. He is not married. 

Adelat has owned his store, where he sells food, for two years already. Currently, he needs 2000 AZN in order to purchase products for sale, and thus develop his business. He learnt this business from his grandfather, who also owned his own store. Adelat loves his job and likes to innovate in his work.

loans.use: to purchase food for sale

loans.name: Meswalehe

texts.en:
Meswalehe is a married woman. She has 7 children who are all enrolled in school. Her husband is employed.  

Meswalehe operates a food stall and sells her goods from home.  Her primary customers are her neighbors.  Meswalehe's other source of income is her spouse's income. She describes her greatest business challenge to be inadequate capital to expand her business.  Her highest monthly expense is food for her family.  She owns a house that has both electricity and piped water. 

Meswalehe will use the KES 20,000 loan to purchase rice, beans and wheat flour for her business.  She aspires to establish a hotel in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds to expand her business.

loans.use: buy rice, beans and wheat flour

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en:
Rehema is a married woman. She has 6 children, who are all enrolled in school. Her husband is an employed man.  

Rehema operates a juice and ice (soft drink) selling business and sells her goods from home. Her primary customers are her neighbors. Rehema's other source of income is her spouse's income.  She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality.  Her highest monthly expense is food for her family.  She owns a house that has both electricity and piped water. 

Rehema will use the KES 20,000 loan to purchase fruits, sugar and juice flavours for her business.  Rehema aspires to establish a juice parlor in the future.  She joined Yehu to acquire funds to expand her business.

loans.use: buy fruits, sugar and juice flavours

loans.name: Mwanatumu

texts.en:
Mwanatumu is a married woman. She has 5 children and all are enrolled in school.  Mwanatumu operates a cashew nuts selling business and sells her goods from home. She has worked in this business for 2 years. Her primary customers are her neighbors and passers-by. She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality.  Her highest monthly expense is food for her family. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

Mwanatumu will use the KES 20,000 loan to purchase more stocks of cashew nuts for resale.  Mwanatumu aspires to establish a retail shop in the future.  She joined Yehu to acquire funds to expand her business.

loans.use: buy cashew nuts

loans.name: Asha

texts.en:
Asha is a married woman.  She has 2 children and both are enrolled in school. Asha operates a cashew nuts selling business and sells her goods at the market.  She has worked in this business for 1 year. Her primary customers are the people at the market place. She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality.  Her highest monthly expense is food for her family. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water.

Asha will use the KES 20,000 loan to purchase more stocks of cashew nuts for resale.  Asha aspires to establish a retail shop in the future. She joined Yehu to acquire capital to expand her business.

loans.use: buy cashew nuts

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
Mwanakombo is a married woman. She has 4 children and all are enrolled in school. Her husband works as a businessman. 

Mwanakombo operates a mahamri (dumplings) selling business and sells her goods from home. She has worked in this business for 5 years. Her primary customers are her neighbors. She describes her greatest business challenge to be inadequate capital to expand her business.  Her highest monthly expense is food for her family. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. 

Mwanakombo will use the KES 30,000 loan to purchase more stocks of wheat flour, sugar, yeast and cooking oil for her business. Mwanakombo aspires to establish a hotel in the future. She joined Yehu to acquire capital to expand her business.

loans.use: buy food ingredients to make dumplings

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Ms. Susan has been a businesswoman for one year. She is 40 years old, married, residing at Silangit, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental, and blessed with seven school-aged children.

Ms. Susan has been a member in Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative for eight months already and she borrowed money in Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative for additional business capital. Ms. Susan's business is snack vending. She earns Php. 4,000 monthly in her business as profit. 

 Ms. Susan is improving her living conditions with the use of the profits.

loans.use: to have additional capital for snack vending.

location.town: Silangit, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental, Mindana

loans.name: Josie

texts.en:
She is 40 years old, married, and living at Silangit, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She is blessed with three school-aged angels.

Ms. Josie has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative for two years. She borrowed money through Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative for buying fishing materials. The business venture of fishing is located at Migcanaway, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental.

Ms. Josie is improving her living conditions with the use of the profits from her existing business and is now hoping for a new business venture.

loans.use: to have business capital for fishing

location.town: Silangit, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental, Mindana

loans.name: Raziya

texts.ru: Разие 42 года, замужем. В 2000 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, Разия начала свой бизнес в животноводстве со стартовой суммы в 20,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорству и настойчивости Разии, на сегодняшний день,    ее хозяйство  приносит около 11,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Разия обратилась в компанию «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойных коров. В будущем, Разия хочет увеличить хозяйство, расширить свой бизнес и мечтает  о своей мини-ферме.
texts.en:
Raziya is 42 years old, and married. In search of an income for her family, Raziya started her business of animal husbandry in 2000, with a starting sum of 20,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Raziya's persistence and perseverance, her farm currently brings in around 11,000 som (KGS) a month from the sale of meat and dairy products. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Raziya turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partner" for a loan in the amount of 70,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of dairy cows. In the future, Raziya wants to enlarge her farm, expand her business and she dreams of her own mini-farm.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “CUSI COYLLOR DE CHINCHERO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba  y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Cesar; el tiene 54 años de edad, casado y tiene 4 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de golosinas el cuenta con un triciclo donde vende todos sus productos de forma ambulatoria como galletas,dulces,chupetines entre otros, él socio trabaja todos los días durante el día ,el socio es una persona bien alegre y responsable ,a la vez el socio se decía a la crianza de animales como cuyes, gallinas y chanchos ,el socio de esta manera saca adelante a su familia. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería para su negocio como dulces, chicles, chupetines entre otros.

El socio se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en:
Introducing Cesar, a member of “CUSI COYLLOR DE CHINCHERO”, a Communal Bank located in Chinchero, a district of the Urubamba province in the Cusco department.
Cesar is 54 years old, he is married and he has 4 children. He alternates his daily chores with his activity selling sweets. He is a street vendor and he owns a three-wheeled vehicle he uses to sell all his products: biscuits, candies and lollipops among other items. He works very hard every day, and he is a very cheerful and responsible person. At times he engages in breeding animals such as “cuyes” (“cuy” is Quechua for Guinea pig), hens and pigs, and thanks to these activities he is able to provide for his family.

He is requesting a loan to buy products for his activity such as sweets, chewing gums and lollipops among other items.

He commits to complying with his repayments.

loans.use: To buy sweets, chewing gums and lollipops to sell.

loans.name: Laureano

texts.es:
Laureano tiene 57 años pero el nos comenta que tiene el espíritu y la vitalidad de un joven de 18, el es casado y junto a su esposa tiene un hijo de 11 años de edad el cual cursa el primer año de secundaria y por el cual el da la vida por darle lo necesario y que sea feliz; Laureano vive en la ciudad de imperial, ciudad con extensiones las tierras agrícolas son de primera calidad, las cuales son completadas con aguas permanentes de regadío en donde destacan la presencia de canales de riego que tienen enorme incidencia en la producción y productividad agraria.

Laureano es muy trabajador, con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación logro ahorrar dinero y forjo su negocio actual el cual es la venta de abarrotes, le dedica alrededor de 9 horas diarias, ya que por la noche el trabaja como vigilante de las playas de su ciudad, por ello al ir llegando la noche su esposa y su hijo se encargan del negocio ya que el va a cumplir con su otro trabajo y es Laureano nos dice que sin sacrificio no hay recompensa y si uno quiere salir adelante hay que hacer lo que se pueda, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque su familia es su mejor motivación además de que son muy unidos y todos cooperan para salir adelante.

Laureano agradece mucho a los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada el podrá comprar más mercadería y podrá ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos, con esta mejora tendrá mayores ingresos y podrá ahorrar para poder cumplir su gran sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hijo y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia”.
texts.en:
Laureano is 57 years old but tells us that he has the spirit and vitality of a youth of 18. He is married, and together with his wife he has an 11 year old son who is in his first year of secondary school and for which he gives life by giving him what is necessary to be happy. Laureano lives in the city of Imperial, a city with extensive agricultural land of top quality, complete with permanent water for irrigation which includes the presence of irrigation canals that have an enormous impact on agricultural production and activity.
Laureano is very hardworking, with much great effort and dedication he managed to save money and forge his business which today is a general store. He works around 9 hours daily, since at night he works as a guard of the beaches of the city. Therefore when nightfall arrives his wife and son are in charge of the business since he goes to perform his other job. It is Laureano who tells us that without sacrifice there is no reward and if one wants to get ahead you have to do what you can. He believes that his business is going well because his family is his best motivation. Additionally they are very close and all cooperate in order to move forward.
Laureano is very thankful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to the help provided he will be able to buy more merchandise and be able to offer a wider variety of products. With this improvement he will be able to have increased profits and be able to save in order to achieve his great dream: “To give a profession to his son and better the quality of life for his family.”

loans.use: to buy merchandise (wholesale)

loans.name: Esward

texts.es:
Esward es un padre de familia de 34  años de edad, que reside junto a su esposa y a su menor hijo en el distrito de Olmos, una zona agrícola situada a más de hora y media al norte de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque. La zona se caracteriza por la producción de limón.
Desde hace más de 10 años se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, los cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal son comercializados en el mercado local, además brinda servicio de transporte en una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado utilizado para transportar carga y pasajeros), con los ingresos que obtiene de estas actividades el trata de sacar adelante a su familia.
Esward desea adquirir alimentos balanceados para engordar su ganado y lograr que estos se desarrollen de mejor modo, percibiendo mayores ingresos por sus ventas, para ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 3000 nuevos soles que contribuyan al logro de su objetivo.
El ya ha tenido créditos con Edpyme Alternativa en el pasado y ha demostrado ser un cliente bastante responsable y puntual con sus pagos.
texts.en:
Esward is a 34-year-old parent who lives with his wife in the Olmos district, an agricultural area located more than an hour and a half north of the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region. 

The area is noted for producing lemons. For more than ten years, he has raised and sold pigs, which are sold in the local market once they reach optimal size and weight. In addition, he provides a  mototaxi transportation service. A mototaxi is a motorized vehicle used to transport freight and passengers. With the income he gets from these activities, he tries to help his family get ahead.  

Esward wishes to acquire balanced feed to fatten his livestock, and ensure they develop better, so that they earn him greater income through his sales. 

To do so, he felt it advisable to apply to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles that will contribute to attaining his objective. He has already had past loans with Edpyme Alternativa, and has shown himself to be quite a responsible client, who makes his payments on time.

loans.use: To buy balanced feed to fatten his livestock, and ensure they develop in the best way.

loans.name: Leidy

texts.es:
Leidy es una persona que se ha caracterizado por siempre querer emprender su propio negocio y generar sus propios ingresos con los cuales pueda contribuir a sus padres con los ingresos de su hogar. Leidy, con 25 años de edad, montó su propio salón de belleza hace un tiempo, donde ofrece el servicio de corte de cabello y arreglo de uñas. Su salón de belleza ya es reconocido en su sector por la buena calidad del servicio que ofrece Leidy, y gracias a esto, ha visto como sus ventas han aumentado considerablemente en los últimos meses. Leidy actualmente se ha visto con muy poca capacidad económica, debido a diferentes dificultades con sus padres, sin embargo, ha podido seguir adelante con su negocio y no parar su actividad. Con el ánimo de poder comprar insumos necesarios para su salón de belleza, Leidy aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de insumos para su salón de belleza como son removedor, esmalte, entre otros.

Leidy espera que de esta manera pueda continuar ejerciendo su actividad y su propio negocio siga creciendo cada vez más. Leidy sueña con que su salón de belleza crezca y pueda contratar personas que requieran de unos ingresos, y sueña con que sus padres puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Leidy is a person who has always been characterized by wanting to start her own business and generate her own income to help contribute to her parents’ household expenses.  At the age of 25, Leidy set up her own beauty salon some time ago where she offers haircuts and manicures.  Her beauty salon is well-known in the sector because of the good service Leidy provides and thanks to this she’s seen her sales increase considerably the last few months.

Recently, Leidy has had very little economic capacity due to various problems her parents have had.  However, she’s been able to continue going forward with her business and not stop her activity.  Hoping to be able to buy needed supplies for her beauty salon, Leidy is hoping for a loan that will make it possible for her to buy supplies for the beauty salon like nail polish remover and nail polish, among others.

Leidy hopes that in this way she will be able to continue exercising her activity and that her own business will continue growing more each time.  Leidy dreams with her beauty salon growing and with being able to hire other people who need to earn income; she also dreams with her parents being able to enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes es socia del Banco Comunal Lealtad, tiene 26 año de edad, es soltera, es madre de 1 hija, viene siendo socia desde hace 1 año, es negociante compra y vende carne de cerdo y res, esta en Finca Perú por invitación de una socia, gracias a Finca pudo ahorrar y comprarse su congeladora y balanza electrónica, le gusta las capacitaciones por le hablan del ahorro, como invertir en sus negocios también le ayudó a mejorar en lo personal para con su familia, también le gusta por que Finca hace campañas de salud que es bueno, sacará un préstamo para invertir en su negocio en la compra de carne de cerdo.
texts.en: Mercedes is a member of the “Lealtad” (Loyalty) communal bank.  She’s 26 years old, single and the mother of one daughter.  She’s been a member for a year and she’s a merchant who buys and sells pork and beef.  She was invited to join Finca Perú by one of the members.  Thanks to Finca she was able to save up and buy a freezer and an electronic scale.  She likes the training sessions because they talk about saving and how to invest in her business; they also helped her to improve her personal relationships with her family.  She also likes Finca because it carries out health campaigns which are a good thing.  She will take out a loan to invest in her business buying pork.

loans.use: to buy pork.

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es: Flor de María es socia del Banco Comunal Renacer, tiene 45 años de edad, es madre de 2 hijos, es casada y socia de FINCA Perú desde hace mas de 17 años, se dedica a la venta de carne, le gusta ser socia de Finca, dice que aprendió mucho durante las reuniones como la puntualidad, responsabilidad, gracias a Finca Perú, los ahorros y los préstamos que ha recibido ha logrado hacer su casa e incrementar su capital de su negocio, también sacó algunos préstamos para pagar los estudios de sus hijos, gracias a ello uno de sus hijos ahora es profesional, en cuanto a las capacitaciones le gusta porque le habla sobre sus negocios y sobre la familia que le sirve para que eduque a sus hijos, el préstamo que solicita ahora lo utilizará en incrementar su negocio con la compra de ganado.
texts.en:
Flor de María is a member of the “Renacer” (To Be Reborn) communal bank.  She’s 45 years old, married and the mother of two children.  She’s been a member of Finca Perú for more than 17 years.  She sells meat.  

She likes being a member of Finca because she says that she learned a lot during the meetings like punctuality and responsibility.  Thanks to Finca Perú, the savings and the loans she’s gotten she’s succeeded in building her house and increasing her business capital.  She also took out some loans to pay for her children’s schooling and thank to them one of her children is now a professional.  

With respect to the training sessions, she likes them because they talk about her businesses and about family which helps her educate her children.  The loan she’s asking for now she will use to increase her business buying cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Kulumkan

texts.ru:
Кулумкан  49 лет,  замужем, имеет 4 сыновей и дочь. Все дети взрослые, семейные. В поисках дохода, сыновья Кулумкан уехали на заработки, оставив ей внуков. Сегодня  Кулумкан проживает с внуками  в селе  Сретенка Московского района.
Кулумкан имеет многолетний опыт в животноводстве и полеводстве.  В собственности семьи имеется 5 га орошаемой земли, она вместе с супругом   выращивают  бахчевых культуры,  помидоры, которые реализуют на местном рынке. Также, Кулумкан выращивает  ячмень, люцерну, кукурузу, использующимися  в качестве корма для скота. Кулумкан содержит небольшое хозяйство в три дойные коровы и ежедневно сдает молоко производителям молочной продукции, что приносит около 20,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Также, супруг Кулумкан оказывает услуги пассажирских перевозок местному населению. 
В целях дальнейшего расширения своего бизнеса, Кулумкан обратилась в компанию «Бай - Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойных коров.  Доходы от кредита Кулукан планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение хозяйства.
texts.en:
Kulumkan is 49 years old, she is married and has four sons and one daughter. All her children are grown up and have families. In search of income her sons went away to find work and left her with grandchildren. Today Kulumkan lives with her grandchildren in the village of Sretenka in the Moskovsky region.

Kulumkan has many years of experience in animal husbandry and crop cultivation. The family owns five hectares of irrigated land where together with her husband Kulumkan grows melons and tomatoes which they sell on the local market. Also Kulumkan grows barley, alfalfa and corn which is used as fodder for livestock. She has three milk cows and gives the milk daily to the producers of dairy products which brings her around 20,000 som (KGS) a month. Also Kulumkan's husband provides taxi services by transporting local residents.

With a goal to further expand her business Kulumkan has come to Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy milk cows. She plans to invest the profit from the loan in further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase milk cows.

loans.name: Clara

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CUSI COYLLOR DE CHINCHERO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Clara; ella tiene 38 años de edad; casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias ejerciendo la elaboración de tejidos como chompas, chalinas, guantes, mantas entre otros, la socia lleva ya buen tiempo en este negocio, a la vez la socia se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan como restaurantes, la socia es una persona responsable con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para la elaboración de los tejidos como lana.

La socia se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Introducing Clara, a member of “CUSI COYLLOR DE CHINCHERO”, a Communal Bank located in Chinchero, a district of the Urubamba province in the Cusco department.
Clara is 38 years old, she is married and she has 3 children. She alternates her daily chores with her waiving activity, creating knitted fabrics such as sweaters, scarves, gloves and blankets among other products. She has been engaged in this activity for a good while already; and at times she also breeds small animals such as “cuyes” (“cuy” is Quechua for Guinea pig) and hens to then sell them to customers that require them, such as the restaurants. She is a responsible person with a strong will to succeed and to provide for her family.

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as wool to prepare her fabrics.

She commits to complying with her repayments.

loans.use: To buy wool to preapre her fabrics.

loans.name: María Baltazara

texts.es:
María Baltazara tiene 26 años de edad, es casada con 03 hijos a su cargo. Vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos en el sector Jesús de Nazaret, una zona marginal del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima tropical caracterizada por la producción de frutas como el mango y el limón. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a cinco horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
Ella cuenta con una bodega instalada en su propio domicilio en donde ofrece a sus clientes todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad, así como verduras, frutas y abarrotes, cuenta con clientela ya establecida en la zona; adicionalmente vende cerveza. 
El negocio le permite ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia, el es un trabajador de la municipalidad de la zona y juntos tratan de sacar adelante la economía de su familia. María desea adquirir más productos con la cual pueda hacer crecer su negocio y seguir creciendo como empresaria. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 800 nuevos soles.
Ella es una persona bastante conocida y estimada por sus vecinos y conocidos, quienes la consideran una mujer responsable y hogareña.
texts.en:
María Baltazara is 26 years old, and is married with 3 children in her care. She lives together with her spouse and children in the sector Jesús de Nazaret, a marginal zone of the agricultural district of Tambogrande. This zone is of a tropical climate characterized by the production of fruit such as mango and lemon. The zone finds itself located in the Piura region, 5 hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the region Lambayeque.

She has a shop installed in her own home in which she offers her customers all types of staple products, such as vegetables, fruits and groceries. She says that she is already established with customers in the zone. Additionally, she sells beer.

The business allows her to help her husband and with economics of the family. He is an employee of the municipality of the zone and together they try to move forward the economy of the family. María wants to acquire more products with which she can grow her business and continue growing as an entrepreneur. In order to achieve her objective she considered it appropriate to request for the first time to Edpyme Alternativa a loan of 800 nuevos soles.
She is a person well known and highly esteemed by her neighbors and acquaintances, who consider her a homey and responsible woman.

loans.use: to acquire more products with which she can expand her business.

loans.name: Yury Sarela

texts.es:
Yury tiene 21 años de edad, es soltera y vive junto a sus abuelos, su vivienda está ubicada en el Caserío Guaraguaos Bajo, una zona rural del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima tropical caracterizado por la producción de frutas como el mango y el limón. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a cinco horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
Se dedica desde hace un año a la crianza y venta de aves de corral, las cuales engorda para luego comercializarlas en el mercado del distrito. Adicionalmente trabaja como obrera en los fundos agrícolas de la zona durante la temporada de mango.
Yury desea adquirir alimentos balanceados para engordar a sus aves, así como también desea realizar mejoras en sus corrales, para ello ha solicitado por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles con los que planea lograr su objetivo y sacar adelante a su negocio.
Ella es una joven bastante trabajadora y responsable, las personas que le conocen en la zona donde vive le tienen mucho cariño y estima.
texts.en:
Yury is 21 years old, single and lives with her grandparents. Their house is located in the rural community of Guaraguaos Bajo, a rural zone in the agricultural district of Tambogrande. It is a zone with a tropical climate, characterized for it's production of fruits like mango and limes. The zone is located in the region of Piura, five hours from the city of Chiclayo, which is the capital of the region Lambayeque. 

For the past year she has made a living raising and selling poultry, which she fattens up and then sells in the district market. She also works as a laborer in agricultural farms during mango season.   

Yury wants to buy feed for her birds to fatten them and she also wants to make improvements to the birds pens. It is for this that she has requested a loan of 1000 nuevos soles which she plans to use to accomplish her objective and move ahead in her business. 

She is a very hard working young woman and very responsible. The people that know her in the area where she lives treat her with affection and esteem.

loans.use: to buy feed to fatten her birds.

loans.name: Gloria Gumercinda

texts.es: Gumercinda es socia del Banco Comunal Renacer, tiene 60 años de edad, es madre de 5 hijos, es casada, se dedica a la venta artesanía, es socia de Finca Perú por invitación de una amiga, estuvo 4 años en BC Alelí se retiró por motivos de salud luego se reincorporo al BC Renacer lo cual ya va mas de 3 años, le gusta Finca Perú por que les brinda apoyo a las mujeres que necesitamos dice, también les da los préstamos con facilidad e intereses bajos; dice que las capacitaciones hay cosas nuevas que le gusta por que le ayudó a mejorar en su negocio y para con su familia; el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en su negocio en la compra de materiales como son lana para la elaboración de chompas.
texts.en:
Gumercinda is a member of the “Renacer” (To Be Reborn) communal bank.  She is 60 years old, married and the mother of five children.  She sells crafts.  

She was invited to join Finca Perú by a girlfriend.  She was a member of the “Alelí” (Violet) communal bank for four years but because of health issues had to drop out but then rejoined Renacer communal bank and has been in it for over three years.  

She likes Finca Perú because it supports women who need it, she says.  It also hands out low-interest loans with easy terms.  She says that the there’s always new things in the training sessions and she likes them because they helped her improve her business and her family.  

She will use the loan she’s requesting to invest in the business buying materials like wool to make sweaters.

loans.use: to buy wool.

loans.name: Anita Lucia

texts.es:
Anita tiene 27 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 01 hijo a su cargo. Vive en junto a sus padres en el caserío Guaraguaos Alto, una zona rural del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima tropical caracterizado por la producción de frutas como el mango y el limón. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a cinco horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores, ella cría ovejas y cerdos, los cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal son comercializados en el mercado local, esta actividad la desarrolla desde hace 3 años. Con los ingresos de esta actividad ella trata de sacar adelante a su hijo y colaborar con el sustento de su familia.
Anita desea adquirir alimentos balanceados para engordar su ganado y lograr que estos se desarrollen de mejor modo, percibiendo mayores ingresos por sus ventas, para ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que contribuyan al logro de su objetivo.
Ella es una joven bastante trabajadora y responsable, las personas que le conocen en la zona donde vive le tienen mucho cariño y estima.
texts.en:
Anita is 27 years old and a single mother of a son in her care.  She lives with her parents in the Guaraguaos Alto settlement, a rural zone in the farming district of Tambogrande which has a tropical climate and is noted for fruit production like mangoes and lemons.  The zone is located in Piura Region five hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region’s capital.

She raises small farm animals like sheep and pigs which when they reach ideal size and weight are sold at a local market; she’s been in this line of work for the last three years.  With income from this activity she tries to support her son and contribute to her family’s support.

Anita wants to buy nutritionally balanced feed to fatten up her livestock so that they will develop better thereby earning higher income from their sale.  To do so, she thought it advisable to request her first, 1000 new sol, loan from Edpyme Alternativa to help her reach this objective.

She is quite a hardworking, responsible young woman.  People who know her in the zone where she lives hold her in high esteem and affection.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally balanced feed for her livestock.

loans.name: Lucero Liliana

texts.es:
Lucero es una madre de familia de 34 años de edad, que vive junto a su esposo y a su hijo en  el  Caserío Vallecito, una zona rural del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima tropical caracterizado por la producción de frutas como el mango y el limón. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a cinco horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
Se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado menor y aves de corral, ella cría estos animales en la parte posterior de su domicilio, cuando estos se han desarrollado completamente los ofrece en venta. Por otro lado su esposo cuanta con una pequeña parcela donde siembran mango y limón, valiéndose de estas actividades para sacar adelante a su familia.
Lucero desea adquirir alimentos balanceados para el engorde de sus animales y de ese modo venderlos a un mejor precio en el mercado local, esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.
Ella ya ha tenido créditos con Edpyme Alternativa en el pasado y ha demostrado ser una cliente bastante responsable y puntual con sus pagos.
texts.en:
Lucero is a 34-year-old mother living with her husband and son in Vallecito hamlet a rural zone of the agricultural Tambogrande District, a zone with a tropical climate noted for fruit production like mangoes and lemons.  The zone is located in Piura Region, five hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region’s capital.

She raises small farm animals and barnyard fowl.  She raises these animals in her back yard and when they have developed fully she puts them up for sale.  On the other hand, her husband has a small parcel of land where he grows lemons and mangoes.  They rely on these activities to support their family.

Lucero wants to acquire nutritionally balanced feed to fatten up her animals so that she can sell them for a better price in the local market.  This investment will allow her to continue growing in her business and improving her quality of life.  To reach her objective she’s decided to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan.  She’s had prior loans with Edpyme Alternativa and has shown herself to be quite responsible and punctual with her payments.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Gulaiym

texts.ru:
Гулайым  48 лет, замужем. После распада Советского Союза, Гулайым была вынуждена оставить профессию преподавателя и заняться торговлей игрушками, сувенирными и канцелярскими товарами. Стартовав с суммой в 50,000 сом (KGS), Гулайым сумела развить свой бизнес с ежемесячным доходом в сумме около 30,000 сом.   
В целях расширения ассортимента товаров, Гулайым обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS).  Гулайым помогает сыну в постройке дома для семьи и планирует вложить часть доходов в помощь сыну, часть – в дальнейшее увеличение ассортимента товара.
texts.en: Gulaiym is 48 years old and married.  After the collapse of the Soviet Union, she was forced to leave her teaching profession and became involved in the sale of toys, souvenirs and office supplies.  With a starting sum of 50,000 som (KGS), she was able to develop her business, earning a monthly income of about 30,000 som.  In order to broaden her selection of goods, she has turned to "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS).  Gulaiym is helping her son to build a house for the family, and she is planning to invest her revenues in part to help her son and in part to further increase her selection of goods.

loans.use: to broaden her selection of goods.

loans.name: Rasim

texts.ru: Rasim uje 11 let kak imeyet svayo kafe. On nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit novuyu pasudu dlya svoyego kafe. Rasim jenat i imeyet 3 detey. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom (Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов)) pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoimi lubimimi detmi i jenoy. Rasim 50 let. On ochen userdno rabotayet chtobi soderjat svoyu semyu. On xochet razvit svoy bizness i uvelichit svoi mesachniye doxodi.
texts.en:
Rasim has been running his own cafe for eleven years already. He needs 2,000 AZN to buy new dishware for his cafe. Rasim is married and has three chidlren. He is an IDP (internally displaced person) – someone who has been forced to suddenly flee from his home because of an armed conflict, violence, human rights violations, natural disasters or other catastrophes, but unlike refugees has not crossed an international border and is inside the territory of his own country (source: UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs).

He has been relocated from the town of Fuzuli and now lives in the Fuzuli region together with his beloved wife and children. Rasim is 50 years old. He works very diligently to support his family. He wants to expand his business and increase his monthly income.

loans.use: to purchase new dishware for the cafe.

loans.name: Kadzo

texts.en: Kadzo is a 27-year-old single woman. She has 2 children, both enrolled in school. Kadzo operates a food stall business and sells her goods from home. Her primary customers are neighbors. She describes her greatest business challenge as competition from other food stall operators. Her highest monthly expenses are food and school fees. Kadzo will use this KES 10,000 loan to pay school fees. She rents a house that has neither electricity nor piped water and hopes to purchase a plot to build her own home in the future. Kadzo joined Yehu to access capital.

loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Maria Natalia

texts.es:
María Natalia es una madre de familia de 34 años de edad, reside junto a su esposo y a sus 04  hijos en el caserío Luchadores Sociales, una zona rural del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima tropical caracterizado por la producción de frutas como el mango y el limón. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a cinco horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
La actividad que desarrolla es la venta de chicha, cerveza y comida, ella atiende todos los días de la semana a clientela conocida, además cría animales menores, ovino y aves de corral, en la parte posterior de su domicilio. Su esposo trabaja en una empresa Agro-industrial de la zona, entre ambos siempre tratan de mantener la economía de su familia del mejor modo posible, ambos tienen una relación bastante armómica.
María desea adquirir insumos para la elaboración de chicha de jora y realizar mejoras en su hogar, esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 3000 nuevos soles. 
Ella ya ha tenido créditos con Edpyme Alternativa en el pasado y ha demostrado ser una cliente bastante responsable y puntual con sus pagos.
texts.en:
María Natalia is a 34-year-old mother living with her husband and four children in the Luchadores Sociales hamlet, a rural zone in the agricultural Tambogrande District which has a tropical climate characterized by fruit production like mangoes and lemons.  The zone is located in Piura Region, five hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region’s capital.

María sells chicha [corn-based beverage], beer and food.  She works every day of the week tending to known customers.  She also raises small farm animals like sheep and barnyard fowl in her back yard.  Her husband works for an Agro-Industrial firm in the zone.  Between the two of them they try to maintain the family’s economy the best way possible.  They have quite a harmonious relationship with each other.

María wants to acquire ingredients to make chicha de jora and to do some home improvements.  This investment will help her continue to grow in her business and thus improve her quality of life.  To reach this objective she’s deemed it advisable to request a 3000 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa.  She’s had prior loans with Edpyme Alternativa and has shown herself to be responsible and punctual with her payments.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients and to make some home improvements.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
Justina es una madre de familia de 57 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y a su menor hijo en el caserío San Eloy, una zona rural del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima tropical caracterizado por la producción de frutas como el mango y el limón. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a cinco horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
Justina es comerciante, ella vende ropa, productos de primera necesidad y además ganado menor y aves de corral, los cuales cría en la parte posterior de su domicilio, con los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad ayuda a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía familiar.
Ella desea adquirir mercadería para surtir su negocio, además desea adquirir alimentos balanceados para el engorde de sus animales para venderlos a un mejor precio en el mercado local, esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Para lograr su objetivo, ella ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.
Ella ya ha tenido créditos con Edpyme Alternativa en el pasado y ha demostrado ser una cliente bastante responsable y puntual con sus pagos.
texts.en:
Justina, 57, is a mother living with her husband and minor son in San Eloy, a rural zone of the agricultural Tambogrande District which has a tropical climate characterized by the production of fruit like mangoes and lemons.  The zone is located in Piura Region, five hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region’s capital.

Justina is a merchant; she sells clothes, basic staples and also minor farm animals and barnyard fowl that she raises in her back yard.  With income from this activity she helps her husband support the family economy.

She wants to acquire merchandise to stock her business and also nutritionally balanced animal feed to fatten up her animals and sell them at a better price at the local market.  This investment will allow her to continue to grow in her business thus improving her quality of life.  To reach her objective, she has deemed it advisable to request a 1000 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa.  She’s had loans with Edpyme Alternativa in the past and has shown herself to be quite a responsible, punctual client with her payments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and animal feed.

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es: Consuelo es socia del Banco Comunal Renacer, tiene 52 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de comida, gracias a los préstamos que le da Finca saco adelante a su familia y su negocio, también llegó a construir su casa, esta orgullosa por que con su esfuerzo esta logrando muchas cosas como sacar adelante a sus hijos, le gusta mucho las reuniones y las capacitaciones porque aparte de distraerse se fortalece con las charlas que le dan, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en compra de víveres para la elaboración de su comida.
texts.en: Consuelo is a member of the communal bank "Renacer."  She is 52 years old, and has a business selling food.  Thanks to the loans provided by FINCA, she has been able to make progress with her family and her business.  In addition, she has been able to build her house.  She is proud, because with her hard work, she is achieving many things, including helping her children to get ahead.  She enjoys the meetings and training she gets at FINCA very much, because in addition to being entertaining, the talks that are provided have strengthened her as a businesswoman.  She will invest this loan to purchase ingredients to make her food.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make food to sell

loans.name: Dayanat

texts.ru: Dayanat jenat i imeyet 3 detey. Yemu 36 let. Dayanat yavlyayetsya IDP personom ( Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов))on pereyexal iz Fuzuli goroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy. Dayanat uje 7 let kak imeyet etot magazin dge prodayet televizori i stoli pod telefizori. Dayanat nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit novix tovarov(televizori, dvd i t.d) dlya  prodaji.
texts.en: Dayanat is married and has three children. He is 36 years old. Dayanat is an internally displaced person (IDP). An IDP is someone who had been forced to suddenly leave their home due to an armed conflict, violence, human rights abuse, natural disasters or other catastrophes, but unlike a refugee did not cross international borders and resides in their own country as defined by the UN Commission on Coordinating Humanitarian Issues. Dayanat arrived from Fuzuli city and lives in the Fuzuli region together with his family. Dayanat has been managing a TV and TV furniture store. He needs a loan of 2000 AZN to purchase additional TVs as well as DVDs etc. for sale in his store.

loans.use: to purchase goods for sale

loans.name: Ubando

texts.es:
Ubando es un padre de familia de 40 años de edad, reside junto a su esposa y a sus 03  hijos en uno de los caseríos del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima tropical caracterizado por la producción de frutas como el mango y el limón. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a cinco horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
La actividad que desarrolla el titular es la agricultura y ganadería, cuenta con más de 3 años de experiencia en el manejo de sus negocios, con estas actividades se encarga de sacar adelante a su familia. Su esposa suele apoyarle en las actividades que realiza.
Ubando desea adquirir fertilizantes para su cultivo de limón, además desea comprar alimentos balanceados para el engorde de su ganado y así poderlos vender a un mejor precio en el mercado local. Esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles. El ya ha tenido créditos con Edpyme Alternativa en el pasado y ha demostrado ser un cliente bastante responsable y puntual con sus pagos.
texts.en:
Ubando, 40, is a father living with his wife and three children in one of the hamlets in the agricultural district of Tambogrande, a zone with a tropical climate characterized by fruit production like mangoes and lemons.  The zone is located in Piura Region five hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region’s capital.

Ubando is a farmer and raises livestock.  He has more than three years’ experience running his businesses.  With these activities he’s able to support his family.  His wife tends to support his activities.

Ubando wants to buy fertilizer for his lemon crops and also wants to buy nutritionally balanced feed for his livestock so that they will sell for better prices at the local market.  This investment will allow him to continue growing in his business and thus improve his quality of life.

To reach his objective he’s asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan.  He’s had loans with Edpyme Alternativa in the past and has proven to be quite a responsible, punctual client with respect to his payments.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and animal feed.

loans.name: Ysabel

texts.es:
Ysabel tiene 56 años de edad, es casada  y tiene un hijo a su cargo. Vive junto a su familia en el caserío Platillos, una zona rural del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima tropical caracterizado por la producción de frutas como el mango y el limón. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a cinco horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
Se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno, el cual le produce leche fresca para su venta diaria; también a la crianza de ganado ovino, porcino y pavos, los cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado local. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con terreno propio en el cual siembra mango y algodón.
Ysabel desea adquirir alimentos balanceados para el engorde de sus animales y de ese modo venderlos a un mejor precio en el mercado local, del mismo modo aumentar la producción de sus vacas. Esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.
Ella ya ha tenido créditos con Edpyme Alternativa en el pasado y ha demostrado ser una cliente bastante responsable y puntual con sus pagos.
texts.en:
Ysabel, 56, is married and has a son in her care.  She lives with her family in Platillos hamlet, a rural zone in the agricultural Tambogrande District which has a tropical climate good for fruit production like mangoes and lemons.  The zone is located in Piura Region five hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region’s capital.

She raises cattle which produce fresh milk to sell every day; she also raises sheep, pigs and turkeys which when they reach ideal size and weight are sold at the local market.  Her husband’s a farmer; he has his own parcel of land where he grows mangoes and cotton.

Ysabel wants to buy nutritionally balanced feed for her animals so that she can sell them at a better price in the local market and also increase her cows’ milk production.  This investment will allow her to continue growing in her business and thus improve her quality of life.  

To reach her objective she’s asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan.  She’s had Edpyme Alternativa loans in the past and she’s proven to be quite a responsible, punctual client with her payments.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed.

loans.name: Paulina
